text: Great American Ball Park is a ballpark in Cincinnati, Ohio. It is the home field of the Cincinnati Reds Major League Baseball team. It opened in 2003, and replaced the old home of the Reds, Riverfront Stadium. == Sources == *Green Cathedrals, by Philip J. Lowry Category:Major League Baseball venues Category:Cincinnati Reds Category:Buildings and structures in Ohio Category:Sports buildings in the United States Category:2003 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Ohio
title: Great American Ball Park
